thread.title: 'A Christmas Horror Story' leaves eerie gift in your stocking
thread.title_full: 'A Christmas Horror Story' leaves eerie gift in your stocking

title: 'A Christmas Horror Story' leaves eerie gift in your stocking
text: 'A Christmas Horror Story' leaves eerie gift in your stocking Friday, 2 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) Worst Christmas Eve ever! That's about the size of it for a collection of small-town folks — and one yuletide icon — in the pitch-dark anthology film "A Christmas Horror Story." It's a mixed bag of supernatural terror that gains momentum as its loosely connected quartet of scenarios unfolds. The...
